vote.title: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 23-0822, previously approved on June14, 2023, for the 2024 Barrier-Free Ramp Improvements along Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) Bus Routes, in the amount of $4,444,455.00, from $33,942,245.00 to $38,386,700.00  with Estrada Concrete Company, LLC for the additional barrier free ramp and sidewalk improvements needed - Financing: DART Transportation Projects Fund
vote.description: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 23-0822, previously approved on June14, 2023, for the 2024 Barrier-Free Ramp Improvements along Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) Bus Routes, in the amount of $4,444,455.00, from $33,942,245.00 to $38,386,700.00  with Estrada Concrete Company, LLC for the additional barrier free ramp and sidewalk improvements needed - Financing: DART Transportation Projects Fund
